summary: Feature request to provide access to the last result and last failure information in workflows, allowing workflows to retrieve historical execution outcomes from previous runs.
userImpact: Workflows would be able to access and act upon the results and failures from previous executions, enabling more sophisticated retry and recovery patterns.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented; references feature request #635 in temporalio/features repository
keyQuote: Provide last result and last failure to workflows
